column4: hey you guys ...i do  "sudo gedit /etc/ssh/sshd_config.txt"  but it opens an empty file ,...but when i do "sudo gedit /etc/ssh/sshd_config" it works?...and that file is a text file btw so why doesnt my first try work?
That's because there's no ".txt" at the end of the file.
You can also often-times get more in-depth manuals with other options.
